SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[AsteCommissioni] ( [AsteCommissioni_Ky] smallint IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [Aste_Ky] int NULL , [AsteCommissioni_Da] money NULL DEFAULT ((0)), [AsteCommissioni_A] money NULL DEFAULT ((0)), [AsteCommissioni_Commissione] tinyint NULL DEFAULT ((0)), [AsteCommissioni_UserInsert] int NULL , [AsteCommissioni_UserUpdate] int NULL , [AsteCommissioni_UserDelete] int NULL , [AsteCommissioni_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [AsteCommissioni_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [AsteCommissioni_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[AsteCommissioni] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_AsteCommissioni PRIMARY KEY ([AsteCommissioni_Ky])
